Recap: Josh helps out Cassie, who has a lot to do. He offers to watch R.J. so she can run errands. He also fixes her oven, since she burned her brownies. Jonathan and Reva talk about how she wants to kill herself, and about his problems with Tammy. Reva convinces him to set up a romantic date to win Tammy back. Cassie sees Reva and starts following her, suspicious about what she is hiding. Reva tells her doctor that she isn't going to bother taking any more tests or treatments. Jonathan gets his surprise ready for Tammy. Cassie snoops in Reva's room and finds a bank statement with the huge deposit. Reva tries to write goodbye letters.

Remy takes Tammy to the police station to get her mind off Jonathan. He and Marina ask her to move in to an apartment with them, so she says she'll think about it. Ava and Olivia fight while Coop and Buzz try to calm them down. Alan-Michael and Ava try to convince Frank to arrest Olivia. Olivia and Buzz make love, but then Frank shows up with Ava and Coop to arrest her. Olivia blurts out that she is Ava's mom. Tammy has a chat with Josh about Jonathan, then she phones Remy to let him know she will move in with him and Marina.
Transcript: Cassie: Not quite. Okay. Well, these aren't right. (Phone ringing) Hello? Jim, hi. Two days? Really? You can't get it done sooner? It just means that I'm going to be without a car until then. Yeah, okay. Yeah. It's fine. Go ahead. Thanks. What is... revision one? Where the heck is revision three? Wait a minute. Whoa. No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no.
Josh: Hello? Hey, what's burning?

Cassie: Brownies. Brownie s for R.J.'s bake sale, which I made from scratch, by the way. Everything that could go wrong today has gone wrong. My car is not going to be ready for two days, the new secretary brought me the wrong revisions of the blue prints, and this stupid thing will not shut up! Josh, my life is chaos. My life is chaos. You should run away as far as you can.
Josh: Chaos? I see no chaos.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Reva: Just tell Dr. Jacobs that I'm playing hooky from my appointment today. Because I need to spend some time with the people I love. Doing the things I need to be doing, not taking a bunch of tests just to confirm what I already know. (Sighs)
Jonathan: Would you like me to buy you another red sports car?
Reva: (Laughs) No. I want you to save your money for my new grandbaby. I'll take care of this one.
Jonathan: What's going on?
Reva: I've just been doing a lot of thinking about what we talked about the other day, about how you saw me going off in a blaze of glory hopping into a convertible and driving into the sunset.
Jonathan: Going to off yourself?
Reva: Are you going to try to stop me?
Jonathan: Hell no. Just take me with you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
(Rock music playing) (Knocks on door)
Remy: Yeah. I just came to remind you about the other guests around here.
Tammy: You going to arrest me?

Remy: You have the right to remain silent.
Tammy: Yes.

Olivia: Ava, come back here. Damn it, I am warning you, I brought you into this world, I can take you out!
Ava: What?

Ava: You tried to kill me. Three times. No, wait a minute. Four times.
Olivia: I have tried too hard to apologize. Can we just get past this?
Ava: I was so stupid to even think about giving you another chance. Time's up. You had a chance to turn yourself into the police, and you didn't. I'm having you arrested for attempted murder.
Olivia: No, honey, you're not. I don't want to hurt you, and I certainly would never want you thrown in the back of a trunk.
Ava: You are a liar.
Olivia: Fine, here. Take it. Call Frank. You tell him. You tell him what took you so long to report this crime. It's going to do a lot for your credibility.
Coop: I think we'll let him make that decision, huh?
Olivia: Sure, Coop, fine. In fact, I'll go with you. Ava can make her statement first.

Olivia: Me neither.

Coop: Can you please just have Frank give his brother a call back as soon as he can? Thank you. Look, he'll... tell you what, why don't we just hang out here, huh?

Reva: You know, when my momma died, I was with her. In her hospital room. And I was holding onto her hand and I swear that I felt her leave me. And I never felt so alone in my life. The one person I knew who was always in my corner was gone, never to come back again.
Jonathan: Oh, that's comforting.
Reva: All I'm saying is that I know she's a part of me. That whenever I need her, she's there. Like I will be for you.
Jonathan: You sure?
Reva: Very.
Jonathan: Does Billy know about this?
Reva: Yep.
Jonathan: And he's okay with it?
Reva: Not really.
Jonathan: Some engine you got there.
Reva: I'm sorry I've saddled you with so much. You and the other kids.
Jonathan: It's all right. I'm the tough one.

Reva: Yeah. Yes, you are. That's why once I kick it, you have to keep my secret. Hey, hey, come here. I've got something else to tell you. You know that fishing shack that you and Tammy used to call home for a while? I bought it. All of it. (Laughs)
Jonathan: What?
Reva: I even had them put a "Condemned" sign on the property so that no one would bother you.
Jonathan: Reva, I don't need you to...
Reva: Yes, you do. I need you to know how much you being on my side has meant to me.
Jonathan: Well, you live life on your own terms, then I think you should be able to end life on your own terms.
Reva: (Laughs)
Jonathan: I got one question, though.
Reva: Okay.
Jonathan: Are you really sure that you don't want Josh to know that you love him, always and all that?

Reva: He'll know. I don't know how, but somehow he'll know. He'll be happy with Cassie. But I'll find a way to make sure he knows. I want you to know, too. This is hard. But it's the right thing to do. It's the way I want to leave.

When I saw you in the hospital with Emma, I could see the desperation in your eyes. You were hurt, and you believe in striking first. You... you know, I wish I could protect you from yourself.

Cassie: What else would it be?
Ava: She's got you all conned.
Olivia: It's the truth. Take it. It's your adoption papers. It's your birth certificate. There's a picture there you'll probably recognize.
Remy: You're not having second thoughts are you?
Tammy: No, I can't wait to move in.
Jonathan: So where are you? Call me, please.
